resources.string: SwarmControl is developed at Distributed Organisms, DO bots. It is meant to showcase remote control of many different robots, and in due time, group functionality.
This will show data coming from the robot (like images or compass needle).

SwarmControl is developed at Distributed Organisms or DO bots. DO researches, develops, and maintains robotic swarms. DO is a daughter company of the Dutch research company Almende B.V.
This Android app will be appended over the course of time to showcase remote control of a wide variety of commercial-off-the-shelf robots. Moreover, it will demonstrate group functionality in due time.
Please, realize that most of our swarm solutions use more dedicated robots. See for example http://www.fireswarm.nl for one of our projects, where UAVs are used to find fire for the fire brigade.
SwarmControl is released under GPLv3 license, http://gplv3.fsf.org/
